props.modelValue: Controls the state of sidepanel. If `true`, sidepanel is open
props.showCloseButton: If `true` shows a close button in top right corner
props.sidebarLeft: If `true` displays sidepanel on the left
props.modal: Displays modal variant of sidepanel. Clicking backdrop closes sidepanel
props.noHeader: When `true` the header slot content and close button is not rendered
props.closeButton: Attributes of v-close-button component. See documentation for valid values
props.transition: Sets animation effect when showing or hiding sidepanel. Valid values are: 'fade-slide' or `empty string` to disable animations. Animation speed can be set in `--sidepanel-transition-duration` css variable.
